queries.sql:
SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'amenity'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE tags -> 'highway' IN (
'motorway', 'motorway_link', 
'trunk', 'trunk_link', 
'primary', 'primary_link')

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE tags -> 'highway' IN (
'motorway', 'motorway_link', 
'trunk', 'trunk_link', 
'primary', 'primary_link', 
'secondary', 'secondary_link',
'tertiary', 'tertiary_link')

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE tags -> 'highway' IN (
'motorway', 'motorway_link', 
'trunk', 'trunk_link', 
'primary', 'primary_link', 
'secondary', 'secondary_link', 
'tertiary', 'tertiary_link',
'unclassified', 
'residential')

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'natural'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_relations_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'natural'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'leisure'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_relations_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'leisure'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'landuse'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_relations_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'landuse'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'landuse'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_relations_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND tags ? 'landuse'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_nodes
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POINT%'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE tags -> 'railway' IN ('rail', 'subway', 'tram', 'narrow_gauge', 'monorail', 'light_rail')
  AND NOT tags ? 'service'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%LINESTRING%'
  AND tags -> 'waterway' IN ('river')

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom}
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%LINESTRING%'
  AND tags ? 'waterway'

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_ways_z${zoom} 
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND (tags -> 'natural' = 'water' OR tags -> 'waterway' IN ('riverbank', 'dock'))

SELECT id, tags, geom 
FROM osm_relations_z${zoom} 
WHERE geometrytype(geom) LIKE '%POLYGON%'
  AND (tags -> 'natural' = 'water' OR tags -> 'waterway' IN ('riverbank', 'dock'))
select id, hstore('importance', importance::text) || hstore('name', name::text), geom from custom.custom
